page.title: 12Farms of Arden 2
page.content: The Duchlage Farm which includes Blairglas and Auchentullich is a sheep farm of 600 acres. It is being expanded and developed. At present there are 100 Blackface ewes, 500 cross ewes and 13 Suffolk rams. The flock is to be built up to 850 ewes. About 1,000 lambs were born in 1985. There are plans to buy cattle in the future. The crops are grass, grass silage and rape. Little Dumfin is an arable and stock farm of 145 acres. The farmer has cattle and grows barley and grass. Callendoun Farm has a herd of 140 beef cattle (Hereford and Simmental cross).The crops are hay, silage, barley, oats and turnips. Highfields is a sheep and beef cattle farm of 270 acres, 200 acres of this are arable, 40 acres are rough grazing and 30 acres are heather.
